abstract.t: The Layer 2 Tunneling Protocol ('L2TP') [RFC2661] defines amechanism for tunneling PPP sessions over arbitrary media. Thereexists a class of specific media applications for which protocoloverhead may be optimized, and where such reduction results inimproved operation. This document describes the solution spaceaddressed, its underlying motivations, and the protocol modificationsrequired. The enhancement to the L2TP protocol is called L2TP HeaderCompression, or 'L2TPHC'.
